recipe.title: Pasta Salad with Tomatoes and Corn
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fresh corn kernels (cut from 3 ears) or frozen, thawed
instructions: Whisk 4 tablespoons oil, vinegar, basil and garlic in large bowl to blend. Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add corn; sauté 3 minutes. Add corn to dressing in bowl. Add tomatoes, pasta and cheese to bowl and toss to blend. Season salad with salt and pepper.
